item.title: Adminglow and Telealltome
item.dc:creator: @yar_nova yar nova
item.description:
@yar_nova wrote:

[quote=“InfoManiac, post:20, topic:122235”]Than just add this to your commands…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("xtelealltome") && playerRights >= 2) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }[/quote]

That command will instantly crash your server!

Use this!

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("alltome") && playerRights >= 2) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null && person.playerName != "null")) { person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Adminglow and Telealltome
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Any one have the admin and mod glow i dont need a tut i just need the basic set up[br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2007, 01:23:34 PM[/size][hr][quote=“InfoManiac, post:18, topic:122235”]Add this to your commands

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("xallteletome") && playerRights >= 2) { teleall(); }

And create this void

public void teleall() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } }

Gratz…[/quote]

thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Adminglow and Telealltome
item.dc:creator: @InfoManiac InfoManiac
item.description:
@InfoManiac wrote:

Add this to your commands

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("xallteletome") && playerRights >= 2) { teleall(); }

And create this void

public void teleall() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } }

Gratz…

item.title: Adminglow and Telealltome
item.dc:creator: @bjc22 bjc22
item.description:
@bjc22 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && (playerRights == 3))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.teleportToX = absX;
p.teleportToY = absY;
p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
p.updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto8888: “+playerName+” has teleported "+p.playerName+ “to them”;
p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName);
}
else { sendMessage(“The name doesnt exist.”); }
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to you…”); }
}
else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 2))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
teleportToX = p.absX;
teleportToY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported to "+p.playerName;
sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”); }

}[/code]

There are the teleto and teletome

Read full topic
